reviews.sentence: We had a lot of fun during social nights the Staff was very attentive and the location was great. parking is tight but manageable.

Close to beach and friendly staff. My family of 4 stayed here and we were all pleasantly surprised. Over all our stay was fantastic. We were very close to the beach and vicinity. The property is well maintained. Full kitchen in our room. A nice variety of breakfast items. Pet friendly was what brought us here. The staff were extremely nice and helpful. Parking and security was also AA huge problem was our bed. The mattress was the most uncomfortable thing ever. Overall the hotel was maintained well and had lots of amenities that I was looking for as a parent on vacation with my family. The location is fantastic. 1 mile from the beach. About 30min drive to Santa Monica and Hollywood. The beds. Change the bed mattresses quickly. Our bed was extremely uncomfortable.

Great value and comfy. This is a terrific home away from home. The staff is excellent and really extend themselves to meet your every need. The rooms are spotless and the beds are comfortable. The suites are fully equipped for cooking and they will even go to the grocery store for you. Breakfast is hot or cold and very plentiful. There are even some evenings with free food. And it is good. You will want to stay on and on.

Vacation Apartment. I had an excellent 3 night stay. I got maximum length of stay due to a convenient early check in. Free parking was a complete plus because I rented a car. My room was literally like a mini apartment. Studio is perfect for one person and additional guest. The kitchen was fully equipped I was very close to making a meal simply because I had everything I needed. I passed since the breakfast buffet was so fabulous. Minutes to the beach. Great area nearby shopping and restaurant within steps. Great Mariot bedding clean rooms. good housekeeping no complaints see you all next time.

Such a different hotel style if you want to explore. Good place for family which has independent kitchen with full facilities for your own cooking. Target next to the hotel open from 8 am until midnight. I love their free breakfast at stage house with pool view. The pool has warm water.
Sure Bet on Manhattan Beach Area. The staff are dedicated and the details are well thought of.
Nice hotel and very good location. I stayed two nights and my room was very clean and I enjoyed. Location. Close to the ocean airport and restaurants. Everything is fine.

Great Overnight Stay. Visited Manhaten Beach for our anniversary. It was perfect to stay here. I would give the hot complementary breakfast a 10. One of the reasons we will be staying here again. Close proximity to the beach and restaurants.

Residence Inn Manhattan Beach. I stayed in room 151 for one night. I normally try to get an upper floor on my business trips but because I was only there for one night and my luggage weighed a ton I stayed in a ground level room. My room was very nice. Loved the long bathroom counter. Wished more hotels had long counters like my room had. The bed was very comfy. I did notice the refrigerator makes loud noises at night but other than that. no complaints about my room. The hotel has a outside pool hot tub a fire pit and basketball court. They also have bikes first come first serve that you can rent for 100 an hour to bike up to Manhattan Beach. The beach is not that far away and I was able to take advantage of renting one because there is a great bike trail along the beach. One thing I did notice is that this hotel seems to be very busy. I think if I would have stayed here longer I might see what the pros and cons of this hotel are but as I only stayed one night before I had to fly out of LAX which is 4 miles away I really did not get to see what their breakfast and social hour looked like. There is a Target right next door so easy walk to the store as the hotel is right next to a busy street.

Week stay. My family children 11 year old boy 9 year old girl and two adults stayed for 6 nights. The staff were very friendly and accommodating. The rooms were comfortable. The room we were in had a queen bed and a sofa bed. The bed was very comfortable. The sofa bed was adequate. My son loved using the basketball net. Both children loved swimming and relaxing around the pool. The location was very good. A short drive to the Manhattan Beach pier with most other activities within a 17 mile radius. The morning breakfast was very nice with something for each person. Three nights a week the hotel offered a social time where guests would congregate to share a drink and snack that was provided. We will be returning.

Homey feel that ’s close to beach. This was the final stop after a long drive from Illinois to California. It had a much need feel of having your own apartment very roomy with a the conveniences of home.

Very unsatisfied. I checked in today and have been trying to find another hotel for the past 4 hours so I can get out of here. The room is a penthouse and the corner faces the pool. You can hear all the noises every scream from the pool and playground. The room smells and there are stains on the carpet and furniture. Everything is very very worn. Most of the electric sockets are stripped so I I can not charge my phone in the main room the plug just falls out. The caulking in the bathroom is separating from the bathtub and fixtures and the baseboards are pulling away from the wall in the bathroom. The windows are fogged and the internet keeps going on off because of the construction. They are apparently renovating. It is really gross and not a typical Mariot property especially for 325 per night. Maybe if you get a renovated room it would be better but this is one of the worst hotel experiences that I have ever had. One positive the front desk was very nice although they could not move me to a better room.
Great place. Close to all of our outings. Very Good. It appeared that there has been a recent upgrade to the rooms. Location.

Great Stay. Excellent place to stay. Clean quiet comfortable and spacious describes this hotel. We have stayed here several times and just finished a two week stay. I highly recommend this hotel. It is conveniently located on Sepulveda which is a busy street. However the rooms are located away from the street and we never heard any street noise. The rooms are very clean and comfortable and the staff is friendly and helpful. Breakfast is included and it is delicious. Lots of choices of what to eat. I have stayed in other places in the Manhattan Beach area several times and the Residence Inn is definitely my first choice.

I booked this room because we were just passing thru. The room we got was in no condition to be used. The carpet was soaking wet. The room smelled like mold. As the night went on the smell got worse making it difficult to sleep. My mother slipped and fell in kitchen where the floor was wet. We had to fill out an incident report because she hurt her knee. The manager is suppose to call and follow up and he has yet to do so. Worst stay I ’ve ever had.
Poor. Location. The place was getting remodeled during our stay. The place was run down noisy and dirty. Who remodels their pool during the summer.

Was told the pool was under renovation the whole building is under renovation. The carpet in the room was soaking wet the entire weekend. Trash was under the couch and bed. Couch pull out bed had springs sticking out OUCH. 2 handicaps in our group was given an upstairs suite. The upstairs toilet had a bad leak. There was ONLY ONE good out of this place the entire weekend THE FREE BREAKFAST that is it. I was. am shocked that this place has the name Mariot associated with it.

Great Location. I do a lot of business in Torance Redondo Beach Areas. This hotel turned out to be a great accessible location. I was close enough to my clients to prevent being stuck in traffic and close enough to the night life so I did not become bored. This hotel is well maintained and the staff members seem to be well trained. The breakfast was amazing and the diverse guest were amazing to talk to. The pool is nice making this a great location for families and the property grounds appear very safe for outside play.

Staff was friendly and helpful and accommodating for our large family gathering for the holidays. We decided to celebrate Christmas Eve at this hotel due to the size of the rooms full kitchen. Unfortunately our room did not come with a full stove just a cook top. Luckily other familys room had a full stove and able to cook our dinner. It would of been nice to have bake ware cookie sheet baking pan readily available with a full stove. Luckily there is a Target next door. Overall our stay was a pleasant one and definitely something we had do again for the holidays. Able to accommodate all family parking not a problem.

Will give it one more try. This hotel was recommended by a friend that just returned from a 10 day stay and loved it. I did not love it we had a few problems. its maybe 10 minutes away from LAX a few minutes away from the beach with grocery stores and banks nearby. The staff was friendly and helpful. The room is very spacious and modern the kitchen no oven has frig microwave and utensils with a little sitting bar. Very roomy bathroom shower onlyand sitting area is very good size. The closet was odd so we did n’t use it or maybe did n’t know how to open the door to it lol. Lots of parking directly in front of our room. Could use a new carpet. Then there ’s the free warm breakfast that was constantly being restocked at our request it. was perfect for my granddaughter and I This was the problem ants lots of them in the first room which they gladly moved us. I ’m second room ants again And a loud buzzing in the bathroom and a thermostat that kept the room at 80 even after maintenance lowered It to 70. They offered another room or to spray spraying was n’t an option for me and it was too late to move with all our bags and late at night. At checkout the manager asked how my stay was. He was more than happy to correct the problem. We talked at length he was professional and nice and really listened For that reason alone I would try this property again a second chance.

Stayed here for a business trip. The front desk is nice but had several issues with rooms itself. Initially checked into a room where there were bugs crawled in from the front door. Switched room to a second floor but the door does not lock. Switched room again but the shampoo and conditioner was empty. Put in a request and did not get refilled until the 3rd day. They also ran out of amenities toothbrush and toothpaste.

Great location and staff. but lack attention to details. I have been staying at this hotel for as long as two weeks for the past 7 years twice a year. I love the location as I enjoy hiking to the beach and taking walks on The Strand in the mornings. The mix nights are fun. The staff is extremely friendly and will give you immediate help. when asked. The new renovation is a much needed improvement. But it seems they lack attention to detail in the guest rooms. My most recent 7 night visit included having to ask for conditioner and bath wash refills after they were empty for several days while I waited for someone to notice. No one did so I asked for refills. The bottles were left in the room but I could not figure out how to install in the new and very handy fixture for them. We received one hand soap the entire time one body lotion the entire time. Had to ask twice for toilet paper and twice for dishwasher detergent. I waited until 4 pm twice for the room to be cleaned and it was not cleaned until we asked. I was not even sure if they had cleaning staff on Sunday. I emptied the desk wastebasket every single day. However they may be understaffed especially on weekends. But again the staff is very friendly and responds quickly to remedy any problems. I will stay at this hotel again and again because of its location to the beach and family and the fact it only charges 10 a day parking it used to be free. but I always hope it will be better managed.
I will never stay at this establishment again. The layout of the suite. Being harassed by security and threatened to be thrown out because of playing your television with volume.

Good not great Residence Inn. This is a 5th generation property. The old style Residence Inn with buildings containing 8 or so units 4 of which are accessible by stairs. I used to love this version of the RI because of the 2 bedroom penthouse units. Now that I travel with my aging father I prefer the newer RIs with elevators. That said they have revamped the property. New countertops and furniture flat screen tvs etc. Unfortunately our unit was in need of repair or at least some upkeep. The sofa was missing one of the headrests. The beds did not have headboards. The TVs have an Internet TV Netflix option but it did not work. The staff is friendly and the location is good. There are a lot of RIs in the area so I will likely try some of them before coming back. But if I had to come back it would not be terrible.

Location was accurate and facility was great. In hindsight I could ’ve saved some money staying at a lesser location but a property for individual travelers not families. Not sure if the floors above were thin but I could hear the kids running around above me at all hours.

Really dislike the front desk service. We bought two suites for three nights for four of us and he told me that there is nothing he could do after three nights of not being able to use the pool area because for all three nights it was full of people and if I have a camera I could proved to him that I caught them inviting outside guest and having a pool party smoking weeds and drinking by the pool. The most unbelievable thing was the front desk guy told me that he believed all the guests by the pool was hotel guests because they bought two rooms. I do n’t believe that 20 people can fit in two rooms. One of them legit tell the outside people to just walk in from the parking lot because there was no fence. The parking spots were all taken by their “ guests ”. I am really speechless with the front desk guy ’s service. Breakfast selection was limited and unhealthydiy waffle machine and some other things i do n’t even recall i only remembered the coffee because i did n’t eat any of those food. I am so disappointed with the service. No matter how nice the suites are if you did a terrible job representing your company the customer will always remember. We Will not come back again.

Excellent Service. My stay was almost a month for business and the customer service made me feel like I was among caring friends. Everyone was very friendly and helpful. Jordan at the front desk was especially amazing. He put up with my sometimes cranky requests with a cheerful smile and attitude of making my room needs number one on his list. He noticed when I needed cheering up after long days and made me feel like I had a friend during a stressful trip. Thanks for making my stay so much better than it would have been.

Absolutely amazing property. Rooms are like good apartments look at the photos. Plus very good breakfast and small lunch with alcoholic beverages are included. Reception staff. Johnny and Jordan are the best. is very professional. Pool area and around territory are fabulous. 15 minutes walk to the Manhattan Beach. Would definitely like to stay here again.

I really enjoyed this property. It felt very much like a home and would be perfect for extended stays. I was pleasantly surprised on how modern it was on the inside. The TV was in a perfect spot and rotated for optimal viewing. The desk area was large and provided plenty of much needed work space. During my stay the hot water was nt working. When I mentioned it to the front desk the engineer took care of it quickly. It ended up being my error during colder weather it takes longer for the hot water to kick in. but I appreciated the fast service. The complimentary breakfast was delicious and offered a variety of options. As well the decor of the lobby was very cute and lovely. it is very close to the beach. Just a few minutes driving. As well there are many eateries and stores around so a great location for families friends and anyone really. I travel alot and this particular property has made it into my top 5 with it is friendly associates wonderful decor and overall amazingnes. I definitely recommend it.
There was hair on the skin and a stain on the carpet. My sister did call to address it and they went to clean it.
